Item.Name: Stonecutter
Item.Description: Cut stone into blocks.

Item.Name: Sawmill
Item.Description: Cut logs into planks.

Item.Name: Forge
Item.Description: Melt raw metal ore into bars.

Item.Name: Gemcutter
Item.Description: Cut raw gems.

Item.Name: Loom
Item.Description: Weave raw fibers into bolts of cloth.

Item.Name: Furnace
Item.Description: Convert logs into coal.

Item.Name: Distillery
Item.Description: Distill wine and spirits.

Item.Name: Butcher Shop
Item.Description: Harvest various parts from dead and live animals.

Item.Name: Stonemason
Item.Description: Craft furniture from stone blocks.

Item.Name: Stonecarver
Item.Description: Craft trinkets and statues from stone blocks.

Item.Name: Carpenter
Item.Description: Craft wood furniture.

Item.Name: Woodcarver
Item.Description: Craft trinkets and statues from wood.

Item.Name: Blacksmith
Item.Description: Forge metal bars into tools and various metal items.

Item.Name: Metalworker
Item.Description: Craft trinkets and statues from metal bars.

Item.Name: Machine Shop
Item.Description: Craft mechanical parts from metal bars.

Item.Name: Jeweler
Item.Description: Craft jewelry from metal bars and gems.

Item.Name: Tailor
Item.Description: Sew clothes and bags from bolts of cloth.

Item.Name: Leatherworker
Item.Description: Craft leather armor from hides.

Item.Name: Kitchen
Item.Description: Cook food.

Item.Name: Weaponsmith
Item.Description: Craft weapons.

Item.Name: Armorer
Item.Description: Craft armor.

Item.Name: Tinker Bench
Item.Description: Research new mechanisms and mechanical parts.

Item.Name: Engineer Shop
Item.Description: Assemble mechanisms and traps.

Item.Name: Market Stall
Item.Description: Used by visiting merchants to trade goods.

Item.Name: Training Grounds
Item.Description: Train squads to increase combat skills.

Item.Name: Crude Workbench
Item.Description: Cut logs into planks.

Item.Name: Bonecarver
Item.Description: Carve bone into various items.

Item.Name: Smelter
Item.Description: Melt various items into bars.

Item.Name: Prospector Shop
Item.Description: Search stone and soil for slivers of metal.

Item.Name: Refinery
Item.Description: Refines dirt into sand for glassmaking.

Item.Name: Glass Furnace
Item.Description: A furnace used to mix batches of glass.

Item.Name: Glassworks
Item.Description: A workstation used to precisely heat glass batches and reshape them into useful items.

Item.Name: Kiln
Item.Description: Craft bricks and clay goods.
